DOC.brief_summary: A Multicenter National Prospective Study Pregnancy Neonatal Outcomes Women Inflammatory Bowel Disease study conduct University California San Francisco 30 site around United States part CCFA Clinical Alliance . The aim study determine effect medication use disease activity outcome pregnancy among woman IBD 4 year birth .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter National Prospective Study Pregnancy Neonatal Outcomes Women With Inflammatory Bowel Disease
DOC.detailed_description: All pregnant woman IBD diagnosis take biologics medicine immunosuppressant enter study .
DOC.criteria: Female patient confirm IBD diagnosis pregnant take immunosuppressant and/or biologic therapy Pregnant female patient young 18 year age Confirmed multiple gestation
